name: Bottle Shooting Deluxe Shooter Game
description:
Bottle Shoot Deluxe ! is a cool game to pass your leisure time. Its iphone Mobile's favorite
game.
Surely It can relieve your stress !! Hear the real broken glass sounds! Stunning graphics !
Do you like shooting and broken glass sound ? Blast bottles, play mini-games, and compete all
over the World !You can blast more bottles to get more scores and best glass sounds.
Break more bottles to become a real Bottle Smash Master !
Bottle Shoot is about shooting as many bottles as you can in the fixed amount of time. If you can
do then you can become a real Bottle Hunter Master !
We know you guys like fun and addictive games --- Bottle Smasher is ready for you !
Bottle Spinner : Its a best game for those who like to play can knockdown games.
If you like shooting with the stones and fruits then play this game.
3D effect of this game gives a very cool impression !
Get bonus point!Product Features:
• Realistic sounds of broken glasses.
• Unlimited challenging stages to play.
• Nice and 3D graphical layout.
• Photo-realistic bottles.
• Can ON/OFF the sound effects.
• Good idea to relieve your stress.
Bottle Shooting: Shooter GameHow to make fun (Play) with this Game:
> To break the bottles you have to throw the stone by swipe of your finger on screen.
> Press on top of the stone.
> A little flick with desired direction to throw the object.
> Its simple.Check our other free games like; need more speed, real car racing, racing moto bike,
ninja jump, thanks.Like us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/gamechief
